salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 to LKR 500,000+ per month, dependent on skill, reputation, and hours worked.
futureOutlook: The global freelance market provides a huge opportunity for skilled Sri Lankans to earn foreign currency while working from home. Platforms like Upwork and Fiverr connect local talent with international clients. Success requires not just technical skill, but also professionalism and excellent communication to build a strong international reputation.
